TopicTitle: All Manuevers are reversed, or backwards...

Articles.Content:
Whenever I'm trying to maneuvers to get into orbit, I aim at the blue icon in my nav ball, burn at the correct time, and my ship goes in the opposit direction that I want it to go.

Has anyone else witnessed this?

Am I doing something wrong?

Here's my maneuver.

Whenever I do my burn, It's in the wrong direction, and my orbit collapses.

Any idea why it would be doing this?

Perhaps a picture of your ship would be helpful?

Usually it's either the maneuver is on the other side of the orbit, or your probe core/command pod is reversed.

Are you burning at the correct time? In your picture, I see the text "Node in T - 16m, 8s". This means that you should start your burn in about 16 minutes. You're on the opposite side of the planet right now, so burning at that heading is actually retrograde!

Perhaps a picture of your ship would be helpful?

Usually it's either the maneuver is on the other side of the orbit, or your probe core/command pod is reversed.

Command module was backwards.

It's amazing how simple it was to get to the Mun now.
